title: Twitter Logo Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103165640im_/http:/typophile.com/files/twitter-logo-change_5479.jpg)

Does anyone know whether the Twitter logo is a font? I tried something called Pico which is close, but not correct. Any ideas?

Thanx,

Ross
author: ross_robinson

comments.content: Great article - thanx Simon! No Twitter font listed there though. Someone has suggested, and I tend to agree, it's a custom job.
it sort of looks custom... maybe try posting the question on that fontfeed acticle...

It's probably custom indeed, and in my opinion it's rather poorly done too.  
I mean, what's up with that first 't'? Is it somekind of capital? It's all big and fat. The other two 't's are also much too heavy. The 'e' is just a blob.
